Class Background

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.World
      Background

public class Background
extends greenfoot.World

Background is a Greenfoot World that adds the stat tracking objects to itself. Within the world the user can create specific objects such as the heart bar and mana bar. The stats are designed in a 600 * 400 pixels scenario. Specific methods from the ASImgBars class can be accessed. Using key presses lives and mana values can be controlled

Version:
Sept 2014
Author:
Ahrenn Sivananthan

Constructor Summary
Background()
          Construct a world where the stat bars can be controlled and displayed to users.

          Uses update methods from ASImgBars to manipulate number of lives and amount of mana.

Constructor Detail

Background

public Background()
Construct a world where the stat bars can be controlled and displayed to users.

Parameters:
hearts - The object of a heart created with value for lives and object height.
manaPots - The object of a mana potion created with value for mana and object height
Method Detail

act

public void act()
Uses update methods from ASImgBars to manipulate number of lives and amount of mana. Key Presses of left and right are associated with hearts (representing lives) Key Presses of up and down are associated with potions (representing mana) Runs updateDecrease and updateIncrease methods to change values.

Overrides:
act in class greenfoot.World
